summary: Federal agencies must transition their telecommunications services to new contracts before their current contracts expire in May 2023. However, we testified that most agencies we looked at did not meet key dates for completing contract transition activities (such as soliciting vendor proposals or issuing work orders to selected vendors). These agencies also do not plan to complete the transition by the September 2022 deadline set...
title: Telecommunications: Fully Implementing Established Transition Planning Practices Would Help Agencies Reduce Risk of Costly Delays
